data.text: Yahweh says, “At the time that your corpses are scattered on the ground,
They will take out their bones from their graves and dishonor them by scattering them on the ground under the sun and the moon and the stars—
And all the people of this wicked nation who are still alive and whom I have exiled to other countries will say,
Yahweh said to me, “Jeremiah, tell the people that this is what I, Yahweh, am saying to them:
Yes, they do, so why do these people of Judah continue trusting in those idols that have deceived them?
I have listened carefully [DOU] to what they say,
All the birds that fly south for the ◄winter/cold season► know the time that they need to fly south,
Your men who teach you the laws that Moses wrote have been saying false things about those laws.
Those teachers, who think that [IRO] they are wise, will be ashamed/disgraced and dismayed when they are taken to other countries by their enemies
So, I will give their wives to other men;
They act as though the sins of my people are not serious,
They should be [RHQ] ashamed when they do disgusting things [RHQ],
I will allow their enemies to take away the figs and grapes that the people would have harvested from their fields.
Then the people will say, “◄Why should we wait here in these small towns?/We should not wait here in these small towns.► [RHQ]!
We hoped/desired that things would go well for us,
People far north in Israel in the city of Dan can already hear the snorting of the horses of their enemies who are preparing to attack us.
Yahweh says, “I will send those enemy soldiers to Judah,
I grieve very much for the people of Judah, and my grieving does not end.
Throughout our land, the people ask,
The people say, “The harvest season is finished, the ◄summer/hot season► has ended,
I cry because my people have been crushed.
I ask, “Surely there is [RHQ] medicinal balm in the Gilead region!
